lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Sept. 30 -- Despite the lull in major fighting on the Western Desert front, weeks of rearming and reinforcing since the latest German thrust have worked a profound change in the psychology of the Allied forces. The men of the British Eighth Army, the Royal Air Force and the United States Army Air Forces are no longer thinking defensively.
abstract: Allied viewpoint reptd to have changed from defensive to offensive

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
